title: Man who crossed DMZ was previous defector from N.Korea, South says
content:
1. Man who crossed DMZ was previous defector from N.Korea, South says  Reuters
  2. Man who crossed from South Korea into North Korea presumed to be North Korean defector, Seoul officials say  CNN
  3. Seoul Says North Korea Defector Likely Made Rare Border Crossing Back  NPR
  4. South Korean crosses armed border in rare defection to North  Reuters
  5. South Korean crosses DMZ in rare defection to North Korea  BBC News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:

localize.title: 非武装地帯を横断した男性は北朝鮮からの脱北者だったと韓国が発表
韩方称越过非军事区的男子曾是朝鲜的脱北者
韓方稱越過非軍事區的男子曾是朝鮮的脫北者
